title: Video: Youth Lagoon – July
content:
Tyler T Williams has done it again.

Having visualized Youth Lagoon’s Montana in such a stirring and tear-inducing way, he’s taken another cut from The Year of Hibernation and put it to a stunning video. Almost seeming like a sequel to Montana, the beautifully shot clip is again a admirably personal insight into the music of Trevor Powers and his hometown of Boise. Capturing the very essence of the fragile elegance of July, it’s another in a long line of classics from Williams. Check out the clip below, and the dates Youth Lagoon’s upcoming tour.

Youth Lagoon – July from Tyler T Williams on Vimeo.
